msg-sandbox-confirm: Are you sure you want to start the sandbox mode of {{name}}?
msg-sandbox-mode-description:
Sandbox mode allows you to preview and test your website without saving changes to the server.
Please note that your data changes will only be stored on your device and may be lost if you clear your browser history.
msg-tutorial-notice: Currently in sandbox mode. All data changes in this mode will only be stored on your device.
